title: The Throne
occurrences: It's time for him to take over the throne as a King.
The moment I sat at the throne as a King,
Soon once Seson get to sit at the throne,
might as well use this opportunity to take away the throne!
Please nullify your decision to give the throne to the Crown Prince.
However way, we have to stop Seson from getting the Throne.
as long as we could make a Jongchin who knows nothing to accede to the throne,
Gwa-in wants to give the throne to Seson.
you can sit on the throne.
You who were just born is now a Seja, the heir to the throne.
Because of that I was forced to sit on the throne in front of the scholars like a puppet...
You have to ascend the throne so that you could avenge your father. Isn't it so?
